reviews.review_msg: I liked this class a lot, and I appreciate that the textbook was free. Participation was encouraged in the lectures but not mandatory. Rem211 does have quite a bit of groupwork and there is some coding as well as field work, so be aware of that

Dr. Little is an awesome prof. She expects a lot out of students but provides all the resources needed to succeed. She provides great feedback, explains clearly what she wants you do to and how you'll be graded, and is there for help if you need it. She clearly cares about what she's teaching and about her students' success.
